type: Standing Offer for Civil Engineering Services
short_summary: Request for Standing Offers is for services contract for Civil Engineering projects management throughout Canada except in the territories of Labrador Inuit. Period of standing offer is 5 years from date of contract award.
description: Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is for services related to civil assessments, preliminary engineering, preliminary site investigations, design requirements, and building construction. The request is to establish Departmental Individual Standing Offer (DISO) for the requirement to identify users across Canada, excluding sites that are part of Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements.
full_summary:
### Standing offer for civil engineering services in Newfoundland and Labrador

#### Request for Standing Offers (RFSO)

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Newfoundland and Labrador (NL) Region, invites bids for a standing offer contract to provide civil engineering services for various facilities within the province. 

**Objective:**
The resulting standing offer is designed to provide external resources to support civil assessments, preliminary engineering, design engineering, and construction administration on an "as and when requested" basis. 

**Background:**
The Department's Real Property, Safety, and Security (RPSS) branch is responsible for the life cycle management of various facilities in Newfoundland and Labrador. These facilities include light stations, MCTS centers, warehouses, helicopter hangers, fishways, cabins, wharves, and other infrastructure.

**Scope of Work:**
Individual call-ups may be issued to awarded offerors for various services including investigation and reporting, condition assessment, project scope analysis, design development, tendering, project administration, and commissioning. More specific services will be determined for each subsequent call-up.

**Crown Priorities:**
This request for standing offers is part of the Canadian Government's commitment to advance the interests of Indigenous peoples. Services will be excluded from the resulting standing offer for facilities subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement for the Labrador Inuit.

**Key Milestones:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)
* **Solicitation Method:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Important Details:

* The value of this contract shall be determined based on the prices quoted in the offer.
* The Period of the Standing Offer shall be five (5) years.
* Trade Agreements: The requirement is subject to various international trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

#### Contact Information:

* Name: Juan Villasana
* Email: DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 597-5129

Please refer to the attached documents for a detailed description of the requirements and contract terms. Bidders are advised to ensure they have read and understood the solicitation documents before submitting their bid.
